data.title: Will Ferrell: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Will Ferrell? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Will Ferrell's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Will Ferrell News

Birdland Jazz Club And Birdland Theater Reveals July 2024 Programming

Birdland Jazz Club and Birdland Theater are open this July with a full slate of nightly performances.

SUCCESSION: THE COMPLETE SERIES Coming to Blu-ray in August

Warner Bros. Discovery Home Entertainment is set to release Succession: The Complete Series on Blu-ray. The brilliant high-stakes drama following the Roy Family and their quest for power will be available to purchase online on August 13. The set includes all 39 episodes from all four seasons, plus over 20 bonus features including Inside the Episode featurettes, Character Recaps, Cast and Crew Interviews and more.

Comedian Leanne Morgan Extends JUST GETTING STARTED Tour with a Stop in Thousand Oaks

Comedian Leanne Morgan extends her 'Just Getting Started Tour' with new dates, including a stop in Thousand Oaks.

Comedian Leanne Morgan to Perform At Fox Cities P.A.C. in September

Comedian Leanne Morgan is set to perform at the Fox Cities Performing Arts Center. Learn more about the show and see how to purchase tickets.

Video: See Cynthia Erivo in Trailer for HART TO HEART Season 4

This season, Hart gathers with a new batch of celebrity guests to dive into hour-long conversations about their life journeys, careers and never-before-heard memories. This season’s guests include industry powerhouses Ben Affleck, George Lopez, Cynthia Erivo, Andy Samberg, Judd Apatow and Niecy Nash. Watch the new trailer!

A TERRIBLE SHOW FOR TERRIBLE PEOPLE Embarks on Summer UK Tour

A Terrible Show for Terrible People is a raunchy, feminist physical theatre clown show celebrating female sexuality. This interactive performance takes the audience on a flirtatious journey from death to rebirth.

Video: Watch the New DESPICABLE ME 4 Megaverse Video With Steve Carell

Despicable Me 4 has just dropped a new promo spot featuring franchise star Steve Carell. In the tongue-in-cheek video, Carell announces 'The Megaverse' a clear parody of the Marvel Cinematic Universe featuring the new mega Minions from the upcoming film. Watch the video!

Fourth Season of HART TO HEART to Feature Cynthia Erivo, Andy Samberg, & More

This season, Kevin Hart gathers with a new batch of celebrity guests to dive into hour-long conversations about their life journeys, careers and never-before-heard memories. This season’s guests include industry powerhouses Ben Affleck, George Lopez, Cynthia Erivo, Andy Samberg, Judd Apatow and Niecy Nash.

Review: CASHINO at Birdland Is High-Energy, Nonstop Fun

Susie Mosher (Hairspray) and recording artist John Boswell are Johnny Niagra and Pepper Cole, two desperate, crazy Vegas casino singers. Mosher and Boswell are doing a limited run of Cashino, with a short film followed by a high energy live set featuring crazy, ultra-specific 80s + Broadway mashups. See the last two shows on June 25th and July 30th

Everything Coming to Max in June

Stream The Debuts Of Season Two Of HBO Original Drama Series “House of the Dragon”; HBO Original Comedy Series “Fantasmas”; Max Original Comedy Special “Hannah Einbinder: Everything Must Go”; HBO Original Documentaries “Ren Faire” And “Stevie Van Zandt: Disciple”; And Original Film “Am I OK?”

Natalie Douglas to Present A JUNETEENTH JUBILEE �" THE WOMEN at Birdland

Award-winning vocalist Natalie Douglas will perform her third annual Juneteenth concert, 'A Juneteenth Jubilee – The Women,' at Birdland. Learn more about the performance and see how to purchase tickets.

ELF THE MUSICAL Will Embark on 2024 UK Theatre Tour

After sell-out arena tours and a record breaking two West End seasons at The Dominion, the musical theatre version of the hilarious hit movie ELF will be hitting the road in a handful of the UK's most prestigious theatres.

Nikki Glaser Adds Second Show At Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall

Nikki Glaser's 'Alive and Unwell Tour' adds a second show at Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall due to popular demand.

Video: Watch Trailer for Dakota Johnson Film AM I OKAY?

AM I OK?, a film that first premiered at the 2022 Sundance Film Festival starring Dakota Johnson, debuts Thursday, June 6 on Max. The cast includes Dakota Johnson, Sonoya Mizuno, Jermaine Fowler, Kiersey Clemons, Molly Gordon, with Sean Hayes and Tig Notaro. Watch the trailer now!

Will Ferrell to Create and Star in New GOLF Comedy for Netflix

Netflix has announced a 10 episode order for the scripted comedy GOLF from Will Ferrell, Ramy Youssef and Josh Rabinowitz. The series stars Ferrell, in his first TV comedy series, as a fictional golf legend. Youssef will play a role as well.

Video: Watch the New DESPICABLE ME 4 Trailer Featuring Mega Minions

Despicable Me 4 has just dropped a new trailer for the upcoming film in the fan-favorite franchise starring Steve Carell. The trailer features a new look at the characters, including the superweapons 'Mega Minions,' an experiment destined to go wrong. Watch the trailer now!

Listen: GUTENBERG! THE MUSICAL! Cast Album is Now Available Digitally

The Original Broadway Cast Album of Gutenberg! The Musical! featuring GRAMMY® Award winners and Tony Award® nominees Josh Gad and Andrew Rannells has been released digitally on Friday, May 3. Listen to the album here!

ANCHORMAN: THE LEGEND OF RON BURGUNDY Celebrates 20th Anniversary With 4K Ultra HD Release

Released in theatres on July 9, 2004, ANCHORMAN: THE LEGEND OF RON BURGUNDY marked the feature directorial debut of Adam McKay and was written by McKay and Will Ferrell, who stars as the titular, mustachioed hero. The film features a veritable pantheon of comedic talent, including Christina Applegate, Paul Rudd, Steve Carell, David Koechner, and Fred Willard, along with a cavalcade of cameos. See the bonus content for the release here!

Video: Watch the New Spot for DESPICABLE ME 4 with Nikola Jokic

Despicable Me 4 has just dropped a new promo spot featuring basketball player Nikola Jokic. In the tongue-in-check video, Jokic is in a therapy session where he reveals his perceived resemblance to the character Gru. Watch the video here! In the first Despicable Me movie in seven years, Gru, the world’s favorite supervillain-turned-Anti-Villain League-agent, returns for an exciting, bold new era of Minions mayhem in Illumination’s Despicable Me 4. Watch the video here!
